DOC.brief_summary: This study design evaluate pharmacokinetic drug interaction safety Pitavastatin Valsartan healthy male subject
DOC.brief_title: Drug Interaction Safety Between Pitavastatin Valsartan ( CWP-PTV-101 )
DOC.criteria: Adult male age 20 50 year screen . No significant congenital/chronic disease . No symptoms physical examination . Appropriate subject determine past medical history , laboratory test , serology urinalysis . Be able understand objective , method study , characteristic investigational drug , comply requirement study . Subject must provide write informed consent prior study participation . History presence liver , kidney , nervous system disease , respiratory disorder , endocrinological disorder , hematooncologic , cardiovascular psychiatric cognitive disorder . History gastrointestinal disorder ( bleed , ulceration , hemorrhoid , pile ) disorder absorption , distribution , metabolism , excretion . History known hypersensitivity drug include valsartan pitavastatin .
